solution_line_template: The cost of the {num_students} student tickets is {num_students} * ${student_ticket_cost} = ${<<{num_students}*{student_ticket_cost}={cost_student_tickets}>>}{cost_student_tickets}.
The cost of the {num_teachers} teacher tickets is {num_teachers} * ${adult_ticket_cost} = ${<<{num_teachers}*{adult_ticket_cost}={cost_teacher_tickets}>>}{cost_teacher_tickets}.

Adding the cost of the student and teacher tickets, the museum tickets cost ${cost_student_tickets} + ${cost_teacher_tickets} = ${<<{cost_student_tickets}+{cost_teacher_tickets}={total_cost}>>}{total_cost} in total.
